revisionDesc.change: made basic checking changes to file

body.p: Your wishes admit of easy compliance, since Browning has resolved to make a vacancy of the part of pardon clerk and opportunity will he lost to all in the free of the —my brother has consented to take the place, for law labor, the pending matters to the out by the aid of some one of the clerks, under his supervision.
